page.title: 08COUNTRY PARKS,LOWER PENARTH.
page.content: It is amazing to think that{Cosmeston {Lakes}were once quarries and the park was{derelict}land.It was opened in 1978.On one lake you can{sail,canoe, {windsurf}and swim at your own risk.In the park are{picnic,barbacue}areas,an adventure playground and{horse riding routes.It is an ideal place to relax, to walk the dog,to jog or observe nature.Two wardens welcome visitors and prevent{vandalism."Watch clubs" and{"Country side walks"}help to teach {conservation and anti litter}policy in the park.There is a{decidious woodland with Oak,Sycamore and Hazel.In summer, most visitors picnic and relax.Our class interviewed visitors and asked how often they come.Some came from Cardiff,once a week.Many from Penarth visit every day.People interviewed suggested areas for dogs due to fouled footpaths and disturbed fauna.
